name: Aeve:Zero Gravity
description: "Aeve:Zero Gravity" is an arcade space shooter about battles in open space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256mb Storage: 110 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: or better Storage: 150 MB available space
